title: Please provide ETW logging from a windows phone 8 app.
body: Please expose ETW logging namespaces like System.Diagnostics.Eventing so that it is possible to log events from the windows 8 app.

comments.body: Oren, having read both those articles, one thing is still completely unclear to me: how do I get a .ETL file that includes my custom ETW events? (I know how I'd do that running on an ordinary Windows  machine, but not for an app running on a phone.) That first example includes a lot of detail on how to write an app that generates events, but it's not remotely clear how you enable a trace session on the phone, and collect the results. The ability to generate events isn't very useful if you can't actually get hold of them.

This is already possible today. You can find complete instructions (including information on exposing the events to managed code) at http://wptools.codeplex.com/wikipage?title=Using%20ETW%20Events%20within%20a%20Windows%20Phone%208%20Application
